doc:
Lana Marconi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lana_Marconi 0 Lana Marconi (8 September 1917 in Bucharest, Kingdom of Romania – 8 December 1990) was a Romanian-French actress, and the fifth and last wife of the famous French actor-director-playwright Sacha Guitry (1885–1957), whom she married in 1949. She appeared exclusively in her husband's films. Lana_Marconi ( 8_September_1917 in Bucharest , Kingdom of Romania – 8_December_1990 ) was a_Romanian-French_actress , and the_fifth_and_last_wife of the_famous_French_actor-director-playwright_Sacha_Guitry ( 1885 – 1957 ) , whom she married in 1949 . She appeared exclusively in her_husband 's_films .
